
# Preface {.unnumbered}

## Welcome to NCEAS Learning Hub

The NCEAS Learning Hub's mission is to support environmental scientists throughout their data science journey. We teach cutting-edge data science curriculum, facilitate collaborative learning, and promote best practices in open science. We empower data scientists to more efficiently answer environmental questions.

### Week 1 Traning Learning Objectives:

-   Gain general understanding on data management best practices and how to apply them into the group's work.
-   Get everyone set up on NCEAS Server Aurora to use for analytical work.
-   Introduce how to work with `Git` and GitHub and why is it important in a synthesis context.
